meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from wool or fur.
meanings.sent1: The vell felt soft and warm against her skin.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful vell scarf to keep herself cozy.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten tangled itself in the vell blanket.
meanings.sent4: The vell of the sweater was as fluffy as a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The vell material was so luxurious that it felt like a hug.

meanings.definition: To remove the hair or wool from (an animal skin).
meanings.sent1: She carefully vell the sheep to gather the wool.
meanings.sent2: The farmer needed to vell the alpaca before shearing it.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally vell the dog while trying to groom it.
meanings.sent4: The barber expertly vell the customer's hair with precision.
meanings.sent5: The tailor had to vell the fabric before sewing it into a dress.

meanings.definition: To cover or coat with a soft, fine layer.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to vell the cake with a smooth layer of frosting.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to vell the canvas with a thin layer of paint.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to vell the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent4: The snow started to vell the ground with a blanket of white.
meanings.sent5: The sun began to vell the room with a warm glow in the morning.
